_description: AeroDyn Systems - Equations in new DSL format. Uses p.param_name syntax instead of p['param_name'].

T.name: Targeting Capability
T.target_expr: clamp(p.surveillance_to_targeting * S + 0.2 * R + 0.15 * I + p.data_to_capability * Q + p.ai_boost - p.ethics_constraint * (1 - E), 0, 1)
T.description: Targeting adjusts toward target based on surveillance, resources, integration, data quality, AI boost, constrained by ethics compliance
T.notes: Core capability - drives trust and incidents

S.name: Surveillance Coverage
S.target_expr: clamp(0.4 * R + 0.25 * I + 0.15 * T + p.data_to_capability * Q, 0, 1)
S.description: Surveillance depends on resources, integration, targeting feedback, and data quality

D.name: Decision Support Quality
D.description: Decision support depends on targeting, surveillance, ethics, and V&V maturity (trust in recommendations)

E.name: Ethics Compliance
E.description: Ethics driven by scrutiny, resources, V&V maturity; incidents increase pressure; aggressive targeting draws scrutiny
E.notes: Balancing loop - constrains aggressive capability push

R.name: Resource Capacity
R.target_expr: clamp(p.resource_efficiency + p.trust_to_resources * L + 0.15 * I - 0.1 * (1 - E) - p.vv_investment * V, 0, 1)
R.description: Resources depend on efficiency, trust (procurement), integration; ethics violations and V&V investment cost resources

I.name: System Integration
I.target_expr: clamp(p.integration_rate + 0.12 * T + 0.12 * S + 0.1 * D + 0.1 * Q - 0.1 * p.export_control_pressure, 0, 1)
I.description: Integration depends on all capabilities and data quality; export controls slow integration

L.name: Legitimacy & Trust
L.target_expr: clamp(p.base_trust + 0.25 * E + 0.2 * V + 0.15 * D - p.incident_to_trust * X, 0, 1)
L.description: Trust built by ethics, V&V, decision support quality; eroded by incidents
L.notes: Critical for procurement - reinforcing loop with resources

X.name: Incident Accumulation
X.target_expr: clamp(p.incident_shock + p.incident_sensitivity * T * (1 - V) * (1 - E) - p.incident_decay * (1 - X), 0, 1)
X.description: Incidents driven by capability push when V&V and ethics are low; decay naturally over time
X.notes: Balancing loop - erodes trust and forces compliance

V.name: V&V Maturity
V.description: V&V maturity depends on resource investment, ethics culture, and data quality

Q.name: Data Quality
Q.description: Data quality depends on governance baseline, resources, integration, and ethics (data handling standards)
